name: CompTIA A+
description: CompTIA A+ provides entry-level certificates for people who just started their career in Cybersecurity.

name: Cisco CCNA
description: Cisco provides the Computer Network Certificate to help people gain knowledge of networking and its tools.

name: Certified Ethical Hacker(CEH)
description: Certified Ethical Hacker(CEH) helps you learn about Ethical Hacking.

name: CompTIA Security+
description: CompTIA Security+ is a mid-level certificate for the person who has basic knowledge about Cybersecurity.

name: CISSP
description: This certificate is recommended for people who are interested learning and pursuing a career in Cloud Security.
